    • Method Detail

      • processGoal

        protected static void processGoal(Concept concept,
                                  DerivationContext nal,
                                  Task task)
        To accept a new goal, and check for revisions and realization, then decide whether to actively pursue it, potentially executing in case of an operation goal
        Parameters:
        concept - The concept of the goal
        nal - The derivation context
        task - The goal task to be processed

      • processOperationGoal

        protected static void processOperationGoal(Sentence projectedGoal,
                                           DerivationContext nal,
                                           Concept concept,
                                           Task oldGoalT,
                                           Task task)
        To process an operation for potential execution only called by processGoal
        Parameters:
        projectedGoal - The current goal
        nal - The derivation context
        concept - The concept of the current goal
        oldGoalT - The best goal in the goal table
        task - The goal task

      • questionFromGoal

        public static void questionFromGoal(Task task,
                                    DerivationContext nal)
        Generate <?how =/> g>? question for g! goal. only called by processGoal
        Parameters:
        task - the task for which the question should be processed
        nal - The derivation context

      • bestReactionForGoal

        public static void bestReactionForGoal(Concept concept,
                                       DerivationContext nal,
                                       Sentence projectedGoal,
                                       Task task)
        When a goal is processed, use the best memorized reaction that is applicable to the current context (recent events) in case that it exists. This is a special case of the choice rule and allows certain behaviors to be automated.
        Parameters:
        concept - The concept of the goal to realize
        nal - The derivation context
        projectedGoal - The current goal
        task - The goal task

      • calcBestExecutablePrecondition

        private static ProcessGoal.ExecutablePrecondition calcBestExecutablePrecondition(DerivationContext nal,
                                                                                 Concept concept,
                                                                                 Sentence projectedGoal,
                                                                                 List<Task> execPreconditions,
                                                                                 Map<Operation,List<ProcessGoal.ExecutablePrecondition>> anticipationsToMake)
        Search for the best precondition that best matches recent events, and is most successful in leading to goal fulfilment
        Parameters:
        nal - The derivation context
        concept - The goal concept
        projectedGoal - The goal projected to the current time
        execPreconditions - The procedural hypotheses with the executable preconditions
        Returns:
        The procedural hypothesis with the highest result truth expectation

      • executePrecondition

        private static boolean executePrecondition(DerivationContext nal,
                                           ProcessGoal.ExecutablePrecondition precon,
                                           Concept concept,
                                           Sentence projectedGoal,
                                           Task task)
        Execute the operation suggested by the most applicable precondition
        Parameters:
        nal - The derivation context
        precon - The procedural hypothesis leading to goal
        concept - The concept of the goal
        projectedGoal - The goal projected to the current time
        task - The goal task

      • executeOperation

        public static boolean executeOperation(DerivationContext nal,
                                       Task t)
        Entry point for all potentially executable operation tasks. Returns true if the Task has a Term which can be executed
        Parameters:
        nal - The derivation concept
        t - The operation goal task
